German hard coal importers turn to US and AustraliaGerman importers of coal for power generation, heating and steelmaking have found new suppliers in the United States and Australia, enabling them to end their reliance on Russia, industry body VDKi said on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 17:16:08 GMT FTG67OEOABIPRDDLI7MPOG6WAE https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/german-hard-coal-importers-turn-us-australia-2024-01-17/Reuters商业活力
Serbia wants talks with Rio Tinto over Jadar lithium projectSerbia wants to hold further talks with Anglo-Australian miner Rio Tinto , about its lithium project in the country, President Aleksandar Vucic said on Wednesday, adding that there should also be more public discussion over whether it should go ahead. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 17:04:33 GMT OFR4N7WGQZPMFOPKOH667WF7EI https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/serbia-wants-talks-with-rio-tinto-over-jadar-lithium-project-2024-01-17/Reuters商业达沃斯
Red Sea attacks unlikely to hit French cereals exports to Asia for now - FranceAgriMerAttacks on ships in the Red Sea are unlikely for now to affect exports of French cereals to Asia, notably China which is a key market for France, since they are targeted at ships going towards Israel, farm office FranceAgriMer on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 15:51:21 GMT IQPYILXEDRIXPI77U47X7I7I34 https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/red-sea-attacks-unlikely-hit-french-cereals-exports-asia-now-franceagrimer-2024-01-17/Reuters市场商品
Higher penalties coming for export control violations -US Commerce officialThe U.S. government will crack down on companies that violate export rules, with stiffer penalties to deter future violations involving countries like China, Russia and Iran, a Department of Commerce official said late on Tuesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 15:39:36 GMT 2NM6WXX25NLPXGFBNO7LGACN2E https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/higher-penalties-coming-export-control-violations-us-commerce-official-2024-01-17/Karen Freifeld市场美国市场
Taiwan reports first major post-election Chinese military activityTaiwan's defence ministry said it detected 18 Chinese air force planes operating around Taiwan and carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" with Chinese warships on Wednesday, the first large-scale military activity after the Taiwanese election. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 14:33:15 GMT UP2DHH3PFBNY7KWILLOUK6KOJA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-reports-first-major-post-election-chinese-military-activity-2024-01-17/Ben Blanchard世界亚太地区
OneD, Koch Modular partner to scale up silicon-graphite EV anode materialsOneD Battery Sciences and Koch Modular said on Wednesday they have teamed up to build a factory in North America to produce enough silicon-graphite anode material to supply batteries for around 1 million EVs annually. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 14:03:29 GMT V3CGSGZTQ5JJ5HAIYEQYZ4WBWY https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/oned-koch-modular-partner-scale-up-silicon-graphite-ev-anode-materials-2024-01-17/Nick Carey商业汽车与交通
On visit to Ireland, Chinese premier eyes deeper economic tiesChina would like to deepen economic and trade cooperation with Ireland, particularly in areas of "huge potential" such as green technologies and the digital economy, Premier Li Qiang said on Wednesday during a trip to Dublin. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 13:36:51 GMT 3OE4EZDEAVPC7HDXYM3JPGMDYE https://www.reuters.com/world/visit-ireland-chinese-premier-eyes-deeper-economic-ties-2024-01-17/Reuters世界
India rejects iron ore miner NMDC's proposal for China exports -sourcesIndia's government has turned down a request from state-owned iron ore miner NMDC Ltd to export its ore to China, the world's largest iron ore consumer, three sources with direct knowledge said. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 12:35:16 GMT ASZ35CQXR5OFLHMRR2NZDLQDTM https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/india-rejects-iron-ore-miner-nmdcs-proposal-china-exports-sources-2024-01-17/Neha Arora市场商品
Philippines defence minister calls out China official for "gutter-level talk"The Philippines' defense secretary on Wednesday accused a Chinese foreign ministry official of insulting President Ferdinand Marcos Jr during a news briefing, stooping to what he called "low and gutter-level talk." Wed, 17 Jan 2024 11:25:25 GMT NHRR6F3YPBKQBOVGCAVSJBICRM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-defence-minister-calls-out-china-official-gutter-level-talk-2024-01-17/Reuters世界亚太地区
Blinken says US in demand as he mourns 'gutwrenching' scenes in GazaU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken told business and political leaders in Davos on Wednesday he could not think of a time in his career when there had been more global challenges, ranging from war in Gaza and Ukraine to tensions over Taiwan. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 11:19:03 GMT VGG6ONGLQBKIJP2MPVINFK3LIM https://www.reuters.com/world/us/blinken-says-us-demand-he-mourns-gutwrenching-scenes-gaza-2024-01-17/Leela De Kretser, Alexander Smith商业达沃斯
Wall St slides as Treasury yields dent megacaps after retail sales dataWall Street's main indexes dropped on Wednesday, as rising Treasury yields pressured megacaps after upbeat December retail sales data, tempering hopes of the Federal Reserve kicking off its rate-cut campaign as early as March. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 11:09:03 GMT 66RNDARB6NMTZIFVAESEQ6BKEU https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/futures-slip-rate-cut-uncertainty-looms-tesla-drops-2024-01-17/Johann Cherian, Ankika Biswas市场美国市场
